markets.title: Will Benjamin Netanyahu remain Prime Minister after 2026 election?
markets.description: Israel faces another crucial election amid ongoing political turmoil. Netanyahu's coalition stability remains uncertain. Market resolves based on who forms government after election.

markets.title: Will an Israeli tech unicorn IPO above $5B valuation in 2026?
markets.description: Israel's tech sector continues its hot streak with multiple unicorns eyeing public markets. Several companies including Wiz and Papaya Global are potential candidates.

markets.title: Will Maccabi Tel Aviv reach EuroLeague Final Four?
markets.description: Maccabi Tel Aviv continues their EuroLeague campaign with strong performances. Can they secure a spot in the prestigious Final Four? Resolves based on playoff results.

markets.title: Will Israel's natural gas exports exceed $10B in 2026?
markets.description: Israel's Mediterranean gas fields continue expanding production. New pipeline deals with Europe could significantly boost export revenues. Resolves based on official trade statistics.

markets.title: Will Israel pass major judicial reform legislation in 2026?
markets.description: The controversial judicial reform debate continues to divide Israel. Netanyahu's coalition seeks to limit Supreme Court powers. Massive protests ongoing.

markets.title: Will Israel-Saudi Arabia normalize relations in 2026?
markets.description: Diplomatic efforts continue toward a historic normalization agreement. US mediation ongoing. Major geopolitical implications for the Middle East region.

markets.title: Will Tel Aviv expand public transport on Shabbat in 2026?
markets.description: Secular-religious tensions over Shabbat transport services continue. Tel Aviv municipality pushing for expanded Saturday bus and train service. Opposition from religious parties.

markets.title: Will Israel finish Top 5 at Eurovision 2026?
markets.description: Israel has a strong Eurovision track record and this year's entry is generating buzz. Can they secure another top placement? Resolves after final results.

markets.title: Will Israeli AI startups raise over $3B in 2026?
markets.description: Israel's AI sector is booming with companies in computer vision, NLP, and defense tech. Multiple mega-rounds expected. Resolves based on total funding announced.

markets.title: Will settler population in West Bank increase by 5% in 2026?
markets.description: Settlement expansion continues amid international criticism. Israeli government approving new construction. Demographic shifts with major political implications.

markets.title: Will Hapoel Tel Aviv win Israeli Premier League?
markets.description: Hapoel challenges Maccabi Haifa for the Israeli football championship. Tight race at the top of the table with 10 matches remaining. Resolves at season end.

markets.title: Will Israel produce 90%+ of drinking water from desalination in 2026?
markets.description: Israel leads the world in desalination technology. New plants coming online. Moving toward complete water independence through Mediterranean seawater conversion.

markets.title: Will LDP maintain majority in Japan's House of Councillors election?
markets.description: Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party faces a crucial upper house election. Recent scandals have damaged support. Opposition sensing opportunity for gains.

markets.title: Will Nikkei 225 reach 40,000 before end of 2026?
markets.description: Japanese stocks have been rallying as the yen weakens and corporate governance reforms take hold. Nikkei approaching all-time highs. Can momentum continue?

markets.title: Will Japan admit 500K+ foreign workers in 2026?
markets.description: Japan facing severe labor shortages as population ages. Government expanding visa programs despite traditional resistance to immigration. Demographic crisis deepening.

markets.title: Will Japan qualify directly for 2026 World Cup?
markets.description: Japan's Samurai Blue lead their World Cup qualifying group. Strong performances have them on track for automatic qualification. Must maintain form in final matches.

markets.title: Will Bank of Japan raise interest rates in 2026?
markets.description: BOJ has maintained negative rates for years but inflation finally emerging. Market watching for potential historic policy shift. Yen implications massive.

markets.title: Will Japanese anime exports exceed $15B in 2026?
markets.description: Japanese animation continues global expansion with streaming platforms driving growth. Record international revenue expected as anime enters mainstream Western culture.

markets.title: Will Japan complete Fukushima wastewater release plan in 2026?
markets.description: Controversial plan to release treated nuclear wastewater into Pacific continues despite neighboring countries' objections. IAEA monitoring. Environmental concerns persist.

markets.title: Will Japan's EV production exceed 1 million units in 2026?
markets.description: Japanese automakers ramping up electric vehicle production after slow start. Toyota, Nissan, Honda all launching new EV models. Playing catch-up to China and Tesla.

markets.title: Will a foreign-born wrestler win a Grand Sumo tournament in 2026?
markets.description: Mongolian and Eastern European wrestlers dominate modern sumo. Six tournaments in 2026 with several foreign yokozuna and ozeki competing at the highest level.

markets.title: Will Osaka Expo 2026 exceed 25 million visitors?
markets.description: World Expo comes to Osaka with ambitious attendance targets. Japan's first Expo in decades. International participation strong despite geopolitical tensions.

markets.title: Will Japan receive 40M+ international tourists in 2026?
markets.description: Tourism rebounds strongly post-pandemic. Weak yen making Japan affordable for foreigners. Infrastructure stretched but government pushing for new records.

markets.title: Will Japan's semiconductor production capacity increase 25%+ in 2026?
markets.description: Japan investing heavily in chip manufacturing with TSMC and domestic firms building new fabs. Government subsidies driving renaissance in semiconductor industry.

markets.title: Will Japan win the World Baseball Classic 2026?
markets.description: Japan defending their WBC title with Ohtani and a star-studded roster. Team Japan dominates international baseball. Can they three-peat?

markets.title: Will Erdogan call a constitutional referendum in 2026?
markets.description: Turkish president considering changes to extend term limits and expand presidential powers. Opposition mobilizing to prevent further consolidation of authority.

markets.title: Will Turkey's inflation rate drop below 20% by year-end 2026?
markets.description: Turkey battling persistent high inflation after years of unorthodox monetary policy. New central bank governor attempting orthodox approach. Economic pain widespread.

markets.title: Will Galatasaray win the Turkish Super Lig?
markets.description: Galatasaray leads the Super Lig table in a tight three-way race with Fenerbahce and Besiktas. Istanbul derby battles will decide the championship.

markets.title: Will Turkey receive 60M+ tourists in 2026?
markets.description: Turkey's tourism industry rebounding strongly. Weak lira making it attractive destination. Mediterranean and Aegean coasts seeing record bookings.

markets.title: Will Turkey approve all pending NATO expansion applications in 2026?
markets.description: Turkey holds veto power over NATO expansion. Playing hardball on various geopolitical issues. Sweden and potential other applicants waiting for approval.

markets.title: Will Turkey complete 50% of earthquake reconstruction by end 2026?
markets.description: Massive rebuilding effort continues after devastating 2023 earthquakes. Government promised rapid reconstruction but progress slower than expected. Hundreds of thousands still displaced.

markets.title: Will Turkey reach agreement with US on S-400 missile system?
markets.description: Years-long dispute over Turkish purchase of Russian S-400 continues. US excluded Turkey from F-35 program. Both sides seeking face-saving compromise.

markets.title: Will Turkey's domestic EV brand TOGG sell 50K+ vehicles in 2026?
markets.description: Turkey's ambitious electric vehicle project TOGG ramping up production. Government backing strong. Aiming to become regional EV hub and reduce import dependency.

markets.title: Will Istanbul's new Bosphorus metro tunnel open in 2026?
markets.description: Massive infrastructure project connecting European and Asian sides of Istanbul via undersea rail tunnel. Delays and cost overruns but nearing completion.

markets.title: Will Turkish Lira weaken past 40 TRY/USD by end 2026?
markets.description: Turkish lira continues long-term depreciation trend. Central bank attempting to stabilize but pressure intense. Inflation and unorthodox policies driving weakness.

markets.title: Will Fenerbahce reach Europa League semifinals?
markets.description: Fenerbahce showing strong form in Europa League knockout stages. José Mourinho's experience could lead them deep into the tournament. Istanbul club dreaming of European glory.

markets.title: Will Turkish drone exports exceed $3B in 2026?
markets.description: Turkish Bayraktar drones gaining global market share. Proven in conflicts worldwide. Countries lining up to purchase Turkish military technology.

markets.title: Will Australian Labor Party win the 2026 federal election?
markets.description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese seeks re-election amid economic challenges. Cost of living crisis and housing affordability key issues. Coalition mounting strong challenge.

markets.title: Will Sydney median house price exceed $1.5M AUD in 2026?
markets.description: Australian housing crisis intensifying. Sydney prices at record highs despite affordability concerns. Immigration and supply shortage driving continued growth.

markets.title: Will Australia win the 2026 Ashes series?
markets.description: Australia hosts England in the iconic Ashes rivalry. Pat Cummins leads a strong Australian side. England seeking to regain the urn on hostile Australian pitches.

markets.title: Will Australia achieve 50% renewable energy generation in 2026?
markets.description: Australia's renewable energy transition accelerating. Solar and wind projects coming online rapidly. Government committed to ambitious climate targets despite coal lobbying.

markets.title: Will Great Barrier Reef coral cover increase in 2026?
markets.description: After years of bleaching, recent cooler years have allowed some recovery. Climate change threat remains. Annual survey will determine if positive trend continues.

markets.title: Will Australia-China trade fully normalize in 2026?
markets.description: Relations improving after years of trade restrictions. Wine, barley, and other exports gradually being unblocked. Full normalization would be major economic boost.

markets.title: Will Australia's net migration exceed 500K in 2026?
markets.description: Record immigration levels as Australia opens doors post-pandemic. Housing and infrastructure under pressure. Political debate intensifying over sustainable immigration levels.

markets.title: Will Richmond Tigers make AFL Finals in 2026?
markets.description: Richmond rebuilding after dynasty years. Young list showing promise but inconsistent. Can they sneak into finals? Resolves based on regular season finish.

markets.title: Will Australian lithium exports exceed $15B AUD in 2026?
markets.description: Australia dominates global lithium supply. EV boom driving massive demand. New mines coming online but competition from South America and Africa intensifying.

markets.title: Will Australia implement alternative Indigenous representation reforms in 2026?
markets.description: After Voice referendum failed, government seeking other paths for Indigenous representation. Treaty discussions ongoing in several states. National framework uncertain.

markets.title: Will Reserve Bank of Australia cut rates by 0.5%+ in 2026?
markets.description: RBA holding rates high to combat inflation. Housing market cooling but labor market still tight. Market pricing in potential cuts if inflation moderates.

markets.title: Will Australia finalize AUKUS submarine design by end 2026?
markets.description: Historic AUKUS deal moving forward. Nuclear submarine program facing technical and political challenges. Final design approval crucial milestone.

markets.title: Will 2026 Australian bushfire season burn fewer than 1M hectares?
markets.description: Climate change intensifying bushfire risk. La Niña years brought relief but El Niño returning. Improved prevention and response systems being tested.
